entity.name: Cyberpunk 2077
entity.description: This entity includes all conversation about the franchise, as well as any individual installments in the series, if applicable.

text: @CyberpunkGame See, now my 2nd child is due in October, finding time to get immersed in a game is already pretty challenging, I had been hoping, especially after hearing that covid-19 would not impact the launch, that I'd be able to soak in this game before that date.. well... thanks guys...
